definition: to plan a project/to stand on tiptoe/Taiwan pr. [qi4]/abbr. for 企業|企业[qi3 ye4]

sentences.english: A single rookery may contain as many as a million penguins.
sentences.chinese: 一個羣棲地可以容納上百萬個企鵝。

sentences.english: The film anthropomorphized the lives of the penguins.
sentences.chinese: 電影將企鵝旳生活擬人化。

sentences.english: His mother had not returned yet and little penguin was staring with his mouse open .
sentences.chinese: 小企鵝的媽媽還沒回來，他在張嘴而望。

sentences.english: It was based on the story of two real-life penguins.
sentences.chinese: 它僅僅講的是兩隻企鵝的真實的生活的一個故事。

sentences.english: You cannot move Tux in visible mode.
sentences.chinese: 在可見模式中無法移動小企鵝。

sentences.english: Of, relating to, or derived from a glacier.
sentences.chinese: 一羣皇企鵝在大冰川旁曬着太陽。

sentences.english: Well, the Penguin Tea Timer happily does the waiting for you.
sentences.chinese: 現在企鵝泡茶定時器可以幫你代勞啦。

sentences.english: If you don't like the Penguins, you might be shaking your head in dismay .
sentences.chinese: 如果你不喜歡企鵝隊，你有可能會搖頭嘆息。

sentences.english: The little penguin was born last month - and was instantly ill-treated by its parents.
sentences.chinese: 這隻小企鵝是在上個月出生的，剛落地就遭父母虐待。

sentences.english: A seal body fat is one of the natural enemies of the penguins.
sentences.chinese: 體態肥碩得海豹是企鵝的天敵之一。

sentences.english: Most penguins seem to navigate by the sun.
sentences.chinese: 大多數企鵝似乎用太陽來確定方向。

sentences.english: About 12, 000 little penguins are said to live on Montague Island.
sentences.chinese: 據說，有大約一萬兩千只小藍企鵝生活在蒙太古島上。

sentences.english: Currently, two male yellow-eyed penguins – an endangered species like the royal albatross – are incubating an egg.
sentences.chinese: 黃眼企鵝同皇家信天翁一樣，處在滅絕的邊緣。

sentences.english: So, remember that huge, seemingly anonymous group of Emperor Penguins?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，記得那羣巨大看起來毫無區別的帝企鵝羣嗎？

sentences.english: Penguins, ahem, are black and white.
LITTLE POT is an emperor penguin.

definition: to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
